abilities.name: Let's dance!
abilities.description: Let's dance!AbilityBUFF Ruby has 10% initial Physical Lifesteal. Her skills benefit from 115% of her Physical Lifesteal, while her Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal. After each skill cast, Ruby can dash to another location, gaining 9(+1.8*Hero Level) Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level, up to 3 stacks) for 4s.

abilities.name: Be Good!
abilities.description: Be Good!AbilityAoE SlowTypePhysical Skill Ruby swings her scythe, dealing 80(+65%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in an arc. She then releases a shockwave in the same direction that deals 80(+65%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slows them by 40% for 2s. 4.025

abilities.name: Don't run, Wolf King!
abilities.description: Don't run, Wolf King!AbilityCC AoETypePhysical Skill Ruby swings her scythe around herself twice, each swing dealing 60(+55%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5s, and slowly pulling them toward her. 7.050

abilities.name: I'm offended!
abilities.description: I'm offended!AbilityCC AoETypePhysical Skill Ruby sweeps her scythe in the target direction, dealing 200(+200%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit, pulling them toward her, and stunning them for 0.5s. 26.080
